title: Flipped Learning-Based Problem-Solving Language Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Interaction-centered education in a BYOD environment using mobile LMS and VR simulations. Students acquire problem-solving strategies through pre-learning materials, then perform team-based tasks in simulation environments during actual class time

learning_goals: Students can accurately derive language problem-solving strategies from pre-class materials provided in a flipped learning environment with over 80% accuracy.
Students successfully collaborate with team members to solve authentic language-related problems in a VR simulation environment at least three times.
Students can specifically describe three or more impacts of flipped learning on their learning motivation and language proficiency through reflective journals.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
